summary:
Sky Haven Temple is now a real Blades hideout, like Cloud Ruler Temple!
Look inside...
descriptionHtml:
-Now added an alternate version in which the Blades sword memorial does not use weapon racks but instead keeps it off havok settle so if you breath on it it will fall, but looks way better, plus they are pretty high to hit!

Sky Haven Temple is now a real Blades hideout, like Cloud Ruler Temple!

[color=red] Update: Finally got my skyrim working so if anyone has suggestions on what to add to this mod just put it in the comments! Im going to make a standard and an updated file, and see what I can do about adding more blades over time! [/color]

Added a blades sword memorial similar to the one in Cloud Ruler, as well as a better living area with more lights.

1500 downloads, hope you like!

You'll see all the details once inside, but i've made it so when you walk in initially, appropriate things are disabled (such as fires and crops), for lore purposes, until you get far enough in the main quest so don't expect it all to be there at first.

Who wants to walk into a hundred year old structure to find that the fireplace is still on anyhow?
__________________________________________________________________________________________
Expanded "Library" (bookshelf) to an actual library (Multiple bookshelves!) Edit: seeing about adding more books too.

Expanded living quarters

How do they not starve up there without remaining secret and hidden for days and WEEKS???
Now there is some crops outside!

And much more! All pleasant surprises hopfully
And thank you for the other pictures whoever uploaded them!
_________________________________________________________________________________________
If it suits you, check out my other Mod as well-
Â [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35141]MORTHAL, A TRUE HOLD[/url]

Thank you and enjoy!
author: Argornash
